landing.mainTitle: Free lifestyle universe for home and leisure
landing.subtitle: Meeting place for skilled suppliers to the home.
landing.description: Craftsmen, advisors, kitchen brands, lifestyle products and much more. We have gathered a wide range of the most important suppliers for the home, and present them all through short profile videos, Trustpilot reviews and easily digestible descriptions. As a home interested person, you can thus in an intuitive way with just a few clicks find products and services among our partners, and it is our hope that we thereby make the often somewhat challenging exercise of finding good and trustworthy help completely simple and safe. We have namely selected and reviewed each individual partner ourselves. Welcome to Boligmatch+.
landing.transparentJourney: Transparent home journey at a whole new level.
landing.futureDescription: In the future, you as a customer at Boligmatch will also be able to follow your purchase or sales process step by step in an intuitive way on the Boligmatch+ platform. Here you get a clear overview of all steps, activities and tasks, so you always know where you are in the process. In addition, we come with some benefits that have not been seen before in the industry. Sign up for free as a user on Boligmatch+ here - so you can already today get started searching for suppliers, and at the same time automatically keep yourself updated on the upcoming benefits.

recommendModal.title: Recommend us to others
recommendModal.description: Do you think a friend could use our service? Send them a message here
recommendModal.name: Name

contactModal.title: Contact us
contactModal.description: Send us a short description of your project. We will contact you as soon as possible for a non-binding chat. We look forward to helping you.
contactModal.subject: Subject

introModal.recommendedBy: {{name}} has recommended that you take a closer look at our partner:
introModal.description: If this sounds interesting, click the button below to create a free Boligmatch+ account. Boligmatch+ is a digital platform with a fresh and user-friendly approach where home enthusiasts can discover curated products and services for their home from our many skilled partners.

moving.title: Moving and storage
moving.description: Professional moving services and storage solutions for your home

construction.title: Construction and civil engineering
construction.description: Expert builders and construction professionals for your building needs

craftsmen.title: Craftsmen
craftsmen.description: Carpenter, bricklayer, electrician, plumber, painter, glazier, handyman, caulker

interior.title: Interior design
interior.description: Beautiful interior solutions and design services for your home

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Expert advice and professional consulting services

physical.label: Physical assessment and documentation
physical.description: Our team conducts a thorough evaluation of your property, documenting every detail to prepare for sale.

photography.label: Photography and description
photography.description: Professional photos and detailed descriptions showcase your property in the best light.

viewing.label: For sale, open house and viewings
viewing.description: We organize and manage property viewings and open house events to attract potential buyers.

negotiation.label: Offer and negotiation
negotiation.description: Expert handling of offers and negotiations to secure the best possible deal for you.

signing.label: Signing by buyer and seller
signing.description: Finalizing the agreement with all parties signing the necessary documents.

approval.label: Bank and advisor approval
approval.description: Securing necessary approvals from financial institutions and legal advisors.

final.label: Final transaction and registration
final.description: Completing the legal transaction and registering the property transfer.

transfer.label: Transfer and follow-up
transfer.description: Handing over the property to the new owner and ensuring all details are finalized.

partnerStepper.heroTitle: Do you want to be part of an innovative concept where we have each other's back?
partnerStepper.p1: We need strong and skilled partners. We have already partnered with a range of different companies and invite you to take part in this exciting journey and become part of a visionary community.
partnerStepper.p2_before: If you're interested in hearing more about the possibilities, don't hesitate to contact our partner manager {{name}} at
partnerStepper.p3: We look forward to hearing from you!

partnerSteperPara.intro1: Welcome to Boligmatch+ partnerships. We are in the process of building a network of skilled and trustworthy suppliers for the home, so home-interested users can easily and safely search for products and services in one place. We call the platform Boligmatch+, and in the future it will also be the place where our housing customers can follow their buying or selling process. By bringing these activities together under one roof, we make it easy for visitors to meet their needs, while increasing the chance that they will choose one or more of our partners over competitors.
partnerSteperPara.intro2: We believe that a strong collaboration should go both ways, where we act as ambassadors for each other and support each other in creating value. As a partner at Boligmatch, you gain access to a number of exclusive benefits that strengthen your business and open new opportunities. We invite you to take part in this exciting journey and become part of a visionary community.
partnerSteperPara.heading: What benefits do you get as a Boligmatch+ partner?

1.title: Access to our platform
1.description: Boligmatch+ gives you exclusive access to a platform filled with ready-to-buy customers with needs for products and services related to home and leisure.

2.title: Visibility and marketing
2.description: On Boligmatch+, your company gains visibility around the clock, all year round. You get your own mini-website with a professionally produced profile video, a description of the company and its competencies, as well as the display of Trustpilot reviews. Activities can be followed on your own dashboard.

3.title: Focus during viewings
3.description: We bring partners into play at open houses and viewings by focusing on the development opportunities in the individual home, and highlighting which partners can help buyers. This gives you a significant head start compared to competitors.

4.title: Free participation in our network group
4.description: As a partner, you also become part of our B2B network. Here you can build strong relationships, share knowledge and create new business opportunities in a dynamic and inspiring environment, and gain access to exciting benefits and events.

5.title: Discount at Boligmatch for your employees
5.description: All of your employees who join Boligmatch+ receive a 20% discount at Boligmatch.

6.title: Kick-back for referring customers
6.description: If you bring a new housing customer to Boligmatch, we reward you with 10% of the fee, which is transferred to your account in the Boligmatch+ benefits program.

7.title: Profile video and photos
7.description: Professionally produced film and pictures of your company and employees in action. Completely free.

8.title: Marketing on SoMe
8.description: Promotion of your company on our social media channels (Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn) gradually throughout the year.

9.title: No referral fee
9.description: To make it more competitive for our partners, we have chosen to waive the original 10% fee for referrals.

aboutBoligmatch.title: About Boligmatch
aboutBoligmatch.paragraph1: Boligmatch+ is a free lifestyle universe for home and leisure, serving as a meeting place for skilled suppliers to the home. We have gathered a wide range of the most important suppliers for the home, and present them all through short profile videos, Trustpilot reviews and easily digestible descriptions.
aboutBoligmatch.paragraph2: As a home interested person, you can thus in an intuitive way with just a few clicks find products and services among our partners. It is our hope that we thereby make the often somewhat challenging exercise of finding good and trustworthy help completely simple and safe. We have namely selected and reviewed each individual partner ourselves.
aboutBoligmatch.paragraph3: In the future, you as a customer at Boligmatch will also be able to follow your purchase or sales process step by step in an intuitive way on the Boligmatch+ platform. Here you get a clear overview of all steps, activities and tasks, so you always know where you are in the process.
aboutBoligmatch.paragraph4: In addition, we come with some benefits that have not been seen before in the industry. Sign up for free as a user on Boligmatch+ here - so you can already today get started searching for suppliers, and at the same time automatically keep yourself updated on the upcoming benefits.
aboutBoligmatch.paragraph5: Welcome to Boligmatch+. We look forward to helping you find the right solutions for your home and lifestyle.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.paragraph1: By creating yourself as a user on Boligmatch+, you accept these terms and conditions. Boligmatch+ is a platform that connects homeowners with suppliers in the home and leisure sector. We strive to provide a reliable and user-friendly service, but cannot guarantee the results of transactions between users and partners.
termsAndConditions.paragraph2: Users are responsible for verifying the legitimacy and quality of partners before entering into agreements. Boligmatch+ acts as an intermediary and does not assume responsibility for agreements entered into between users and partners. All transactions occur directly between the user and the partner, and Boligmatch+ is not a party to these agreements.
termsAndConditions.paragraph3: We reserve the right to change these terms and conditions. Significant changes will be communicated to users via email or through the platform. Continued use of the service after such changes means acceptance of the updated terms. For questions or concerns, please contact our support.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: This privacy policy describes how we process your personal data when you use the Boligmatch+ platform. Our goal is to provide you with a secure and transparent experience, and we process your data only in accordance with applicable data protection legislation, including the GDPR.

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.responsibility: Boligmatch is the data controller responsible for the processing of your personal data.

collectedData.title: 2. What data do we collect?

providedByYou.title: Information you provide to us
providedByYou.intro: When you register, complete forms, or use the platform, we collect the following information:

items.name: Name
items.contactFormDetails: Any information you submit via contact forms to partners (e.g. subject and message content)

usageData.title: Information about your use of the platform
usageData.intro: To improve our service, we record:

items.favorites: Which partners you mark as favorites
items.inquiries: Which inquiries you send to partners
items.technical: Technical information, including IP address, device type, browser, and cookies (see section 7)

collectedData.noSensitiveData: We do not collect sensitive personal data.

purposes.title: 3. What do we use your data for?

serviceDelivery.title: To provide our service
serviceDelivery.body: To give you access to the partner directory and your personal features (favorites, message history, etc.).

forwardInquiries.title: To forward your inquiries to partners
forwardInquiries.body: When you contact a partner through the platform, we forward your information to the relevant partner so they can respond to your inquiry.

improvePlatform.title: To improve the platform
improvePlatform.body: We analyze user data to understand how the platform is used and how it can be improved.

communicate.title: To communicate with you
communicate.body: We may send you service-related messages, such as confirmations, notifications about changes to your data, or information about new features.

sharing.title: 4. Who do we share your data with?
sharing.intro: We only share personal data with:

items.partners: Partners, when you choose to contact them via the platform.
items.processors: Technical service providers who assist us in operating the system (e.g. hosting, email distribution). These providers act as data processors and process data only in accordance with our instructions.

sharing.noSelling: We never sell your data to third parties.

retention.title: 5. How long do we store your data?
retention.intro: We store your data only for as long as necessary for the relevant purpose:

items.account: Account information is stored as long as you have an active account.
items.inquiries: Inquiries to partners are stored in your message history until you delete your account.
items.logs: Technical log data is stored for a limited period in accordance with applicable security standards.

retention.deleteRequest: You may contact us at any time if you wish to have your data deleted.

rights.title: 6. Your rights
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: The right to access the personal data we process about you
items.rectification: The right to rectification of inaccurate data
items.restriction: The right to restriction of processing
items.objection: The right to object to certain types of processing

rights.contact: If you wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at info@boligmatch.dk.

cookies.title: 7. Cookies
cookies.body: Boligmatch uses cookies to improve your experience, remember your settings, and analyze usage patterns on the platform.
cookies.browserSettings: You can change your cookie settings at any time in your browser.

security.title: 8. Security
security.body: We protect your data through technical and organizational security measures, including encryption, access control, and ongoing security updates.

changes.title: 9. Changes to the privacy policy
changes.body: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. In the event of significant changes, you will be informed on the platform or by email.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.intro: If you have any questions about this privacy policy or our processing of your data, you are welcome to contact us:
contact.name: Rasmus Kirkeby

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. By continuing, you accept cookies.
